Body:
Description: Dear Team,

Customer is getting the error as shown in image attached

What We've Learned Updated: Connected to the backend and saw that they have 19 GB in shadows and 4.5 in Mailer.
-They performed a snapshot of the VM today (3 April)
Next Steps Updated: To connect again on 4th of April and to delete shadows and mailer

What We've Learned Updated: Connected to the backend and saw that they have 19 GB in shadows and 4.5 in Mailer.
-They performed a snapshot of the VM today (3 April)

- Deleted shadows, some backups and the mailer, and now it uses only 25% from /var/eppfiles partition
